title: Animelo Summer Live 2024 -Stargazer- 8/30
overview: The world's largest anime song event, "Animelo Summer Live 2024 - Stargazer -," is now available as Blu-ray, featuring live performances from each event day. DAY1: Features the performances from 8/30. Artists: iRis / Ave Mujica / ASCA / Kento Ito / Aimer / Masayoshi Oishi / Ayaka Ohashi / Hiroshi Kitadani / Tomori Kusunoki / She is Legend / Dempagumi.inc / Togenashi Togeari / FIELD OF VIEW / Who-ya Extended / MindaRyn / Machico / Toshiya Miyata / UniteUp!
